entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
